Summary: i saw 3 triangle like craft that moved after while while i was watching
divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside to smoke for my birthday when i noticed alot of very bright orange stars that at first i thought was very bright stars. (i could make out 3 triangles of stars) there was a formation to the north south and west. the one to the north was the one that moved. it moved infront of a few stars and thats when i noticed it was a dark triangle that was moving and not just a few stars. im hopeing to see it again sometime
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Erie
There were no other sightings in Erie on or around January 22nd 2012
